content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(0.5, 0.5)
- Boiler at position(0.5, 6.0)

### Copper plate mine at position(47.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(47.0, -82.0) and a stone furnace at position(-5.0, -65.0)

### Storage chests
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position(46.5, -83.5)
- Wooden chest at position(48.5, -83.5)
- Wooden chest at position(5.5, -79.5)
- Wooden chest at position(10.5, -79.5)
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, -63.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory to connect entities. In this case, you need pipes to connect the boiler and steam engine.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
